trans-unit.source: Represents a single user interface (UI) entity managed by an <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma entidade de interface (IU) de utilizador único gerida por um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The sole purpose of a Glyph is to paint and hit test.
trans-unit.target: O único objetivo um glifo é de pintura e atingiu o teste.

trans-unit.source: A Glyph does not have a window handle (HWND), as it is rendered on the adorner window control of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: Um glifo não há um identificador de janela (HWND), uma vez que é composto no controlo ao elemento complementar janela de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>

trans-unit.source: Each Glyph can have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> associated with it.
trans-unit.target: Cada glifo pode ter um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>associada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>

trans-unit.source: A successfully hit-tested Glyph has the opportunity to push a new or different <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> onto the behavior stack of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: Um glifo testou com êxito acessos tem a oportunidade para emitir um novos ou diferentes <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>para a pilha de comportamento do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Behavior Service Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [descrição geral do serviço de comportamento](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"> </xref> associados a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"> </xref> associados a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if there is no behavior.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"> </xref> associados a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"> </xref>, ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se não houver nenhum comportamento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the bounds of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os limites do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> representing the bounds of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que representam os limites do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Provides hit test logic.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a lógica de acessos de teste.

trans-unit.source: The GetHitTest method is an `abstract` method that forces <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> implementations to provide hit test logic.
trans-unit.target: O método GetHitTest é um `abstract` método que força <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>implementações para fornecer a lógica de acessos de teste.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>

trans-unit.source: Given any point, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> has decided to be involved with that location, it will need to return a valid <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor>.
trans-unit.target: Atribuído a qualquer momento, se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>tiver optado por estar envolvidas com que a localização, será necessário devolver um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor> válido</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, returning `null` will cause the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> to ignore the location.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, devolvendo `null` fará com que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>para ignorar a localização.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>

trans-unit.source: A point to hit-test.
trans-unit.target: Um ponto de teste de acessos.

trans-unit.source: A if the is associated with p; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: A if the is associated with p; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: Provides paint logic.
trans-unit.target: Fornece paint lógica.

trans-unit.source: The Paint method is an `abstract` method that forces <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> implementations to provide paint logic.
trans-unit.target: O método Paint é um `abstract` método que força <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>implementações para fornecer a lógica de paint.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>

trans-unit.source: The `pe` parameter contains the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> related to the adorner window of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: O `pe` parâmetro contém o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>relacionadas com a janela ao elemento complementar do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Changes the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: As alterações a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"> </xref> associados a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> to associate with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"> </xref> para associar o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"> </xref>.
